game.name: Princesses Prom Dress Design
game.description:
The popular Disney Prom Ball is just around the corner.  There is hardly a princess who will not come at the prom party. All princesses have already hired the best fashion stylist to design their awesome outfits. However, Cinderella has showed her trust you and she has come to you to get designer dress. Will you accept this big challenge? Join Princesses Prom Dress Design and be prepared to prepare a perfect Disney princess outfit for her! You as a popular dress designer can help her to be a princess. 
Nothing could work better than putting your intense fashion abilities to test to dress her up with the fabulous design. Start this dressing game for girls with choosing the colors you like and then choose a lovely outfit from plenty of dress patterns. Your last step is to tailor it using your sewing machine. It will be in your hands now to help the princesses to enter the prom party with the astonishing looks. 
Oh, all major princesses seem to be line up in a search for a lovely prom outfit! However, Cinderella needs your help the most. Put your sense of style and fashion skills to challenge to create the unique and incomparable prom dress for your princess! She would be highly thankful to you if an outfit designed by you will help her get noticed in the prom party. Good luck to have a great time ahead in our more popular girls games that you can explore online, no download required on atmegame.com!
